trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.RenderGrip" /> event.
The following code example demonstrates the use of this type.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個型別。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.RenderGrip> event.
trans-unit.target: 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.RenderGrip>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of a type that inherits from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer>, such as a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSystemRenderer> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProfessionalRenderer>.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含繼承自類型的執行個體的專案<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer>，例如<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSystemRenderer>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProfessionalRenderer>。

trans-unit.source: Then name the instance `ToolStripRenderer1` and ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.RenderGrip> event.
trans-unit.target: 然後將其命名執行個體`ToolStripRenderer1`，並確認事件處理常式關聯<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.RenderGrip>事件。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> object used to paint the move handle.
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> the move handle is to be drawn on.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripGripRenderEventArgs" /> class.
Gets the rectangle representing the area in which to paint the move handle.
A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> that represents the area in which to paint the move handle.
trans-unit.target: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> ，代表要在其中繪製移動控制軸的區域。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.RenderGrip?displayProperty=nameWithType> event.
trans-unit.target: 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.RenderGrip?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of a type that inherits from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer>, such as a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSystemRenderer> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProfessionalRenderer>.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含繼承自類型的執行個體的專案<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer>，例如<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSystemRenderer>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProfessionalRenderer>。

trans-unit.source: Then name the instance `ToolStripRenderer1` and ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.RenderGrip?displayProperty=nameWithType> event.
trans-unit.target: 然後將其命名執行個體`ToolStripRenderer1`，並確認事件處理常式關聯<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.RenderGrip?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the style that indicates whether the move handle is displayed vertically or horizontally.
One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripGripDisplayStyle" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripGripDisplayStyle" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.RenderGrip?displayProperty=nameWithType> event.

trans-unit.source: Gets the style that indicates whether or not the move handle is visible.
One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripGripDisplayStyle" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripGripDisplayStyle" /> 值。
